short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Binance Future Track real-time prices of selected cryptocurrencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is designed to quickly fetch and display real-time price data from the Binance cryptocurrency exchange. The extension offers a simple, user-friendly interface, ensuring users can easily monitor market trends at a glance. Perfect for traders or cryptocurrency enthusiasts looking for quick updates without navigating to external websites.

- Fetches real-time price data from Binance.
- Displays prices in a clear and visually appealing layout.
- Quick updates without visiting the Binance website.
- Lightweight and easy to use.

Supports English, Korean, and other languages
